channel.title: Excel on That's it ! Code Snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Excel on That's it ! Code Snippets

item.title: How to Set Excel Font Style Using Python
item.description: In this tutorial, we will talk about how to set font style for a cell or a range of cells in Excel by Python and openpyxl library.

item.title: Pandas >> Read Multiple Sheets in an Excel
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to read multiple sheets, worksheets in an Excel, workbook. (pd.read_excel, pd.ExcelFile)

item.title: Openpyxl >> How to Work With Excel Files in Python
item.description:
A Python library to read/write Excel xlsx/xlsm/xltx/xltm files.

In this article, we will talk about how to read/write Excel files in openpyxl library including how to load an Excel file to workbook, get a worksheet from workbook, change worksheet name, insert a new worksheet, copy a worksheet, and save workbook into an Excel file.
